item.title: Why a balloon is a flexible bag that can be inflated with a gas
item.description: A balloon is a flexible bag that can be inflated with a gas, such as helium, hydrogen, nitrous oxide, oxygen, and air. For special tasks, balloons can be filled with smoke, liquid water, granular media, or light sources.
